pullrequest.title: Added support for removing sensors at runtime

content.raw:
Is there a reason for this to be here instead of `RenderUtil`? All the `EachRemoved` calls are there, as well as the `EachNew` which creates the sensors.

Also, would it be too much extra work to also remove the other rendering sensors in this PR? If it is, I think it's fine to start with `Camera` only.
